blogPost.excerpt: SpoofSense is a powerful AI algorithm that detects Live v/s Spoof Faces in an Image. It uses Deep Learning to detect Print/Digital Spoof Faces and authenticates Real Faces using just a picture.
blogPost.body: SpoofSense is a powerful AI algorithm that detects Live v/s Spoof Faces in an Image. It uses Deep Learning to detect Print/Digital Spoof Faces and authenticates Real Faces using just a picture.
blogPost.title: SpoofSense - AI for Face Liveness Detection
blogPost.author: Kartikeya Bhardwaj

localize.description: SpoofSense是一个强大的人工智能算法，可以检测图像中的活人脸与假人脸。它使用深度学习来检测打印/数字欺骗面孔，并仅使用一张图片来验证真实面孔。
SpoofSense是一個強大的人工智能算法，可以檢測圖像中的活人臉與假人臉。它使用深度學習來檢測打印/數字欺騙面孔，並僅使用一張圖片來驗證真實面孔。

previous.excerpt: It's easy to forget to take time out of your day for mindfulness and meditation. The Silent Podcast is an automated podcast feed that provides a daily 10-minute pocket of quiet and stillness in your routine.
previous.title: The Silent Podcast - A daily 10 minutes pocket of stillness in your podcast feed

localize.description: 人们很容易忘记从一天中抽出时间来进行心态和冥想。沉默的播客是一个自动播客源，为您的日常工作提供了一个每天10分钟的安静和静谧的口袋。
localize.tagline: 每天10分钟的静止口袋在您的播客饲料

localize.description: 人們很容易忘記從一天中抽出時間來進行心態和冥想。沉默的播客是一個自動播客源，爲您的日常工作提供了一個每天10分鐘的安靜和靜謐的口袋。
localize.tagline: 每天10分鐘的靜止口袋在您的播客飼料
